Title: Provides taxpayer gifts for the cure childhood cancer research fund
Summary: Requires the commissioner of taxation and finance to include space on the personal income tax return to enable a taxpayer to make a contribution to the cure childhood cancer research fund.
LawCode: Add ยง630-k, Tax L; amd ยง99-z, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to providing taxpayer gifts for the cure childhood cancer research fund
